# LIB LOAD #

```{r}
library(tidyverse)     # install.packages("tidyverse")
library(readxl)
library("writexl")
```

# PIPELINE WITH TEST SAMPLES #
```{r}
#################################################
#########        IMPORT FILES          ##########
#########        RESPR OUTPUTS         ##########
#################################################

file_list <- list.files(path = "data/respirometry/shallow/final_rates", pattern = "*.xlsx", full.names = T)

file_list_compiled <- sapply(file_list, read_excel, simplify=FALSE) %>% 
  bind_rows(.id = "id")

photo <- file_list_compiled %>%
  filter(o2 == "Photosynthesis")

ggplot(photo, aes(x = light, y = rate.output)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~Sample_name)

ggplot(photo, aes(x = light, y = rate.output, color = Sample_name)) +
  geom_point() +
  ggtitle("Shall") +
  ylim(-0.0025, 0.025)

```
